== Kanjikkuzhi (CT) (628224) ==

Kanjikkuzhi (CT) is a town in the [[Cherthala]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 12.86 sq. km. and harbouring 6017 households with total population of 23681 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 160 km. Male population is 11566 and female population is 12115. Scheduled Caste population is 1452 and Scheduled Tribes population is 46. Census Location Code of the town is 628224<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 59 km. Railway station is at Mararikkulam at a distance of 2 km.
